longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for at least 6 months from date of arrival.

Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Nationals of Ukraine can obtain a
visa on arrival for a max. stay of 30 days. Extension
possible. Fee: USD 50.-. 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay (USD 200.- per week) and documents required
  for their next destination. 
Warning:
- Visitors must hold return/onward tickets
shortInfo: 30 дневная виза в аэропорту по прибытии (с обратным билетом и подтверждением платежеспособности — как минимум 200 $).
